players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked that Diana was killed. We should all share any suspicions we have about the others."
You: "I'm as shocked as everyone else, Bob. But I think we should watch Charlie closely—he's been awfully quiet so far."
Charlie: "I know Alice is the mafioso from my investigation last night. We should vote her out."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation. We must vote her out now to protect the town."
Bob: "Charlie, your investigation claim is serious, and Alice has been quiet. We should consider voting her out to protect the town."
